name: Sable & Thyme Truffle-Infused Almonds
description: Experience indulgence in every bite with Sable & Thyme Truffle-Infused Almonds. These hand-selected California almonds are gently roasted and then enrobed in an aromatic black truffle oil blend, finishing with a delicate sprinkle of sea salt. Perfect for sophisticated snacking, elegant charcuterie boards, or as a unique gift for food lovers, each resealable pouch guarantees freshness and rich, earthy flavor. Elevate your everyday snack with this luxurious gourmet treat.

attributes.storage: store in a cool, dry place
